item.title: Short Story: The Nature of Evil
item.description: My name is Lord Thaddeus Morne, Sovereign of the Veiled Cities of the Obsidian Reach, a title that should be spoken slowly, preferably with a touch of apprehension. Yes, I am what the bards, the chroniclers, and the more melodramatic paladins like to call an evil overlord. I do not shy from the term; one must own one’s brand.

item.title: PostMortem: Data Leak Brandt Kettwick Defense
item.description: Another leak was closed. I am glad to learn that even law enforcement agencies get ghosted when trying to alert a company on a leak.

item.title: PostMortem: Bolton Walkin Clinic
item.description: This was a leak that was open for a very long time. But finally it was closed.

item.title: PostMortem: Assumed DOJ Montana Leak of Phone Dumps
item.description: The last week I spent a lot of time on closing a serious leak of confidential information from what I assume to be the DOJ Montana. This is my PostMortem on the incident.

item.title: The war between Israel and Iran
item.description: Israel is at war with Iran, again. I want to explain what I see unfolding in this “new” war between Israel and Iran, and how all of it ties into the bigger picture.
